Package oracle.ucp.util.logging

Includes a Universal Connection Pool custom formatter for log messages.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    UCPFormatter
    Universal Connection Pool custom formatter for log messages.

Package oracle.ucp.util.logging Description

Includes a Universal Connection Pool custom formatter for log messages.

A log property file lets you specify the custom formatting for log messages that can be passed as the java.util.logging.config.file command-line option.

The UCPFormatter class can be entered as the value for the formatter property in the log property file.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, see:
  • Oracle Universal Connection Pool for JDBC Developer's Guide
